The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that an ancient monster is with them. Just when you think it can’t get worse than that group has to battle against possible desert natives and soldiers sent to search for this mine too. They also must escape from the underground city below and once they make it out, sand storms start closing in around them
